Package controller

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GameEngine
  • public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible to interpret different commands as provided by User over Command Line Interface Call required methods as appropriate, also update game phases based on method responses.
